synopsis.text: The protagonist of our tale is Kubota, a 19-year-old high school senior who has been harboring feelings for Masana Fujisaka since his junior high days. Despite being surrounded by interested ladies, Kubota remains a virgin, choosing to wait for true love. One fortuitous night, he encounters Masana at a club, fresh from a breakup with her long-term boyfriend. Recognizing this as a golden opportunity, Kubota seizes the chance to reconnect with his first love. However, as they embark on this new relationship, Kubota must navigate the complexities of love and ensure he's not blinded by his past feelings. Will their love stand the test of time, or will it fizzle out as quickly as it sparked? Only time will tell in this engaging anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
